pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a forked version from Sandmark's picom branch, including Blackcapcoder's animation code inside. The animations here are further smoothed and time deltas reduced from 1ms to 40us for high refresh rates and buttery smooth transitions.

use.flag: Build documentation and man pages (requires app-text/asciidoc)
Enable support for using drm for vsync
Enable features that require opengl (opengl backend, and opengl vsync methods)
